title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your emotional bias might skew your judgment about an important decision. Youre more content to stay in your groove at work and dismiss someone or their ideas when the dutiful Taurus Moon in your 10th House of Career opposes quick-thinking Mercury. However, you might miss an essential piece of the puzzle unless you listen closely, even if you already gave your full attention to this topic or person in the past. Let go only after youre sure you absorb all the information thats available now. Author Malcolm Gladwell wrote, The key to good decision making is not knowledge. It is understanding. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
